"Close Call on Wopal!": "Rescue the civilians of Wopal!"
"Destroy the Gum Anemones!"

"/face1 We've found a native lifeform
that has been captured by
a predator. It's in danger.
Please help it as soon as possible."

"/face2 Rescue successful. The native
lifeform seems to be grateful."

"/face4 ...Its readings have
disappeared. Mission failed."

"/face1 One of the native lifeforms
is being swallowed. Please
help it as soon as possible."

"/face1 Please hurry and help it. If you
leave it, it will be swallowed whole."

"/face1 It has been completely
swallowed. If you don't help it

"/face1 We've found a native lifeform
being eaten by a predator.
Get over there and help it."

"/face2 Well done, rescue complete. Look,

"/face1 Its readings disappeared...?

"/face1 It's swallowing that

"/face1 O-oh no! A native lifeform got caught

"/face1 Th-th-that native lifeform
